operators.sql: SELECT p2."nowGroup", p2.grp, p2.timestep, count(*) FROM "patrick:test:particlesOfInterest" p1, "patrick:test:particlesOfInterest" p2 WHERE p1.timestep = 1 and p2.timestep > 1 and p1."nowGroup" = p2."nowGroup" GROUP BY p2."nowGroup", p2.grp, p2.timestep UNION SELECT p3."nowGroup", p3.grp, p3.timestep, count(*) FROM "patrick:test:particlesOfInterest" p3 WHERE p3.timestep = 1 GROUP BY p3."nowGroup", p3.grp, p3.timestep

logicalRa: particle count from all particles of interest
rawQuery: particle count from all particles of interest
